description: Vegetarian sausages work well with the aniseed flavours of fennel to create a tasty veggie paella.
keywords: Paella,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Halal,Vegetarian,Rice,Vegan,Tomato,Dairy free
name: Vegetarian Sausage & Fennel Paella Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g vegetarian sausages, defrosted if necessary, sliced into disks
2 large capsicums, green and red, diced
1 large fennel bulb, finely diced, fronds reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, wide pan on medium high heat and cook the sausages, diced onion, capsicums and fennel for 5 minutes to soften. Add the garlic and paprika and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir in the paella rice and chopped tomatoes, cook for 2 minutes. Pour over the vegetable stock and bring to the boil. Reduce to a simmer and leave to cook, without stirring, for 10 minutes.
Add the roasted red capsicum slices and lemon zest, shake the pan gently and cook for 10 more minutes.
Turn off the heat, cover with foil and leave to stand for 5 minutes. Finish with lemon juice, fennel fronds and cracked black pepper and serve.
